about_the_game:
"

Pathfinder 2 RPG - Bestiary - Syrinscape Sound Link Pack


Syrinscape Sound Link Packs for Fantasy Grounds work with your Syrinscape Super Syrin subscription to provide you context-specific sounds for monsters and NPCs in the Pathfinder 2 RPG - Bestiary (not included).  The collection of Sound Sets can be created for free within the Fantasy Grounds Unity sound interface, but this pack has done all the work for you to link the content.
Syrinscape Sound Link Packs for Fantasy Grounds work with your Syrinscape Super Syrin subscription to provide you with context-specific sounds for monsters and NPCs in the Pathfinder 2 RPG - Bestiary (not included).  The collection of Sound Sets can be created for free within the Fantasy Grounds Unity sound interface, but this pack has done all the work for you to link the monsters.  Appropriate sounds from Syrinscape will show up automatically in your Sound Context Window when you open an NPC.
This pack includes sound sets separated into the following categories:
  • NPCs
  • Moods
  • Music
  • Elements
  • SFX
  • One-shots
"
